name: Jerk Shrimp Stir Fry
description: Shrimp and pineapple coated in Jerk Seasoning is guaranteed to take your tastebuds to the next level. It’s loaded with medium-hot notes of all spice, cayenne pepper and chilies. Flavour tip: Don’t like spice? Opt for one tbsp of Jerk Seasoning instead of two!
preparation:
1. Cook noodles according to package instructions.
  2. Heat oil in Wok over medium-high heat. Chop peppers and onion. Add onion to wok and cook 2 min. Add peppers and peas; cook 3 min or until veggies begin to soften. 
  3. Stir in thawed shrimp and pineapple (including juice); simmer until heated through, 1 min.
  4. Add seasoning and rice noodles. Cook 3–4 min or until sauce thickens.
tips:
Jerk seasoning is made with habanero pepper, which is very spicy! If you are sensitive to spice, try using 1 tbsp; if you are feeling adventurous, go for 2 tbsp!

Use the Multipurpose Pot to prepare the rice noodles—it’s built for heat and has an easy drain spout and lid built right in.
